name: Gara Prime
description: Continue the legend of the glass-armored warrior Gara. Dominate the battlefield with the power and purity of crystal.

abilities.name: Shattered Lash
abilities.description: Lash out with stream of shattered glass, or hold for an arcing strike. Stats are boosted by the equipped mods on Shattered Lash.

abilities.name: Splinter Storm
abilities.description: Gara's armor splinters into a maelstrom of shattered glass. Allies who contact the cloud are fortified against damage.

abilities.name: Spectrorage
abilities.description: Trap enemies in a carousel of mirrors, forcing them to attack visions of their true selves. Destroyed mirrors damage their attackers, as does the collapse of the carousel.

abilities.name: Mass Vitrify
abilities.description: Create an expanding ring of molten glass that slowly crystallizes enemies who enter. When the expansion is complete, the ring hardens to block weapons fire. The ring draws extra strength from the health and shields of crystallized enemies. Use Shattered Lash to smash the ring and send razor-sharp glass flying.

languages.description: Führe die Legende der glasgepanzerten Kriegerin Gara fort. Beherrsche das Schlachtfeld mit der Macht puren Kristalls.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Continuez la légende du guerrier de verre, Gara. Dominez le champ de bataille avec la puissance et la pureté du cristal.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Continua la leggenda della guerriera dall'armatura di vetro, Gara. Domina il campo di battaglia con il potere e la purezza del cristallo.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: 유리로 무장한 전사, 가라의 전설을 이어나가세요. 수정이 가진 힘과 순수함으로 전장을 지배하는 겁니다.
languages.name: 가라 프라임

languages.description: Continúa la leyenda de Gara, la guerrera de la armadura de vidrio. Domina el campo de batalla con el poder y la pureza del cristal.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: 身披玻璃铠甲，继承传奇战士 Gara 的遗志。用水晶的纯净力量统治战场。
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Продолжаем легенду о воине в стеклянных доспехах - Гаре. Доминируйте на поле битвы с силой и чистотой кристалла.
languages.name: Гара Прайм

languages.description: ガラスの鎧を身にまとう戦士、Garaの伝説を引き継ぎ、純粋なる結晶の力で戦場を支配しよう。
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Kontynuuj legendę wojownika w szklanej zbroi, Gary. Zdominuj pole bitwy dzięki mocy i szlachetności kryształu.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Dê continuidade à lenda da guerreira de vidro, Gara. Domine o campo de batalha com poder e pureza cristalinos.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: 繼續玻璃護甲戰士──Gara 的傳奇。透過純淨的水晶力量來稱霸戰場。
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: สานต่อตำนานของนักรบเกราะแก้ว Gara ผู้ที่ใช้พลังและความบริสุทธิ์ของคริสตัลเข้าครองสนามรบ
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Camdan zırhlı bir savaşçı olan Gara'nın efsanesini yaşatmaya devam et. Savaş alanlarına kristalin gücü ve saflığı ile hükmet.
languages.name: Gara Prime

languages.description: Легендарна воїтелька в скляних обладунках, що панує на полі бою за допомогою сили й чистоти кристалу.
languages.name: Ґара-прайм
